original_body_lines: A second individual, identified as Insham Inoon, was taken into custody for assaulting St. Joseph’s College rugby coach Nilfer Ibrahim after their match against Kingswood College in Kandy.
Inoon had made a complaint against Ibrahim following the incident that took place at the end of the Under 19 Inter-School Rugby match between the two schools, before subsequently withdrawing it.
However, Inoon was arrested based on a complaint made by Ibrahim. (SJ)
